issues: Lesson title is 'iOS' but content covers both Google Play Store and App Store publishing - title/content mismatch
Answer 1 in quiz states 'Play Store is usually faster (1-3 days vs 1-2 days)' but then the answer explanation contradicts this, saying App Store is typically faster
Release notes code block incorrectly uses 'language: dart' instead of plain text
Description formula code block incorrectly uses 'language: dart' instead of plain text
Price tier example shows '{{LESSON_CONTENT_JSON}}.99' - appears to be template placeholder not replaced
Bundle ID example 'com.yourcompany.fitnesstracke' has typo - missing 'r' at the end
Missing Privacy Manifest (PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy) requirement - critical for iOS App Store submissions since May 2024
Google Play closed testing requirement outdated - now requires 20 testers for 14 continuous days for new personal accounts (not 100 testers as mentioned)
recommendations: Rename lesson title to 'Publishing to App Stores' to match content
Fix quiz Answer 1 - either change question/answer or fix the explanation to be consistent
Fix template placeholder '{{LESSON_CONTENT_JSON}}.99' to show actual price examples
Fix typo: 'fitnesstracke' -> 'fitnesstrackerproduction' or similar valid bundle ID
Add section on Privacy Manifest requirement for iOS
Update Google Play testing requirements for new personal accounts (20 testers, 14 days)
Change code block languages from 'dart' to 'text' or 'markdown' for release notes

missingSections: WARNING section for common submission mistakes
EXAMPLE section with complete code examples
Dedicated iOS-specific section (title says iOS but covers both platforms)
gaps: No mention of Privacy Manifest requirement for iOS (mandatory since May 2024)
No coverage of TestFlight for iOS beta distribution
No mention of App Store Connect API for automation
No coverage of staged rollout details on Google Play
No mention of Android 15 (API 35) target requirement (August 2025 deadline)
No mention of 16KB page size requirement for Android (November 2025)
No coverage of responding to App Store/Play Store rejections in detail
Challenges array is empty - no practice exercises
No mention of Play Console device verification requirement for new personal accounts
recommendations: Add WARNING section for common submission rejection reasons
Add section on Privacy Manifest creation and configuration
Add section on TestFlight setup and beta distribution workflow
Add section on handling app rejections with example responses
Add practical challenge for creating a complete store listing
Add section on Android 15 compliance requirements
Add section on automation with App Store Connect API / Play Developer API

outdatedItems: Missing Privacy Manifest (PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy) requirement - mandatory since May 2024
Google Play testing requirement outdated - 2023+ policy now requires 20 testers for 14 days for new personal accounts
No mention of Xcode 15/16 requirements for App Store submissions
No mention of API level 35 (Android 15) target requirement deadline (August 31, 2025)
No mention of 16KB page size requirement for Android 15 (November 2025)
No mention of Play Console mobile app verification requirement
Copyright year 2025 is shown correctly but no mention of iOS 18 SDK requirement by April 2025
recommendations: Add section on Privacy Manifest requirements with step-by-step creation guide
Update Google Play testing requirements to 20 testers for 14 continuous days
Add Xcode 15+ with iOS 17 SDK requirement (April 2024)
Add upcoming Xcode 16 with iOS 18 SDK requirement (April 2025)
Add Android 15 (API 35) target deadline of August 31, 2025
Add 16KB page size requirement for Android 15 by November 2025
Add Play Console mobile app device verification requirement

missingPrerequisites: How to enroll in Apple Developer Program ($99/year) vs Google Play Console ($25 one-time)
Understanding of app signing for both platforms (covered in 11.1 but should reference)
Mac requirement for iOS/App Store submissions not mentioned
unansweredQuestions: What if my app gets rejected? How do I respond?
How do I create a Privacy Manifest for iOS?
How do I set up TestFlight for beta testing?
How long does it take to set up developer accounts?
What are the current testing requirements for new Google Play accounts?
How do I handle regional pricing differences?
How do I manage app updates after initial release?
missingUseCases: Pre-release testing with TestFlight/internal testing tracks
Managing multiple apps in the same console
recommendations: Add troubleshooting section for common rejections with example responses
Add section on TestFlight/internal testing workflow
Add section on handling app updates and version management
Clearly state Mac requirement for iOS submissions
Add comparison table of Google Play vs App Store requirements
Add section on regional considerations and pricing

shortSections.recommendation: Expand to include Privacy Manifest requirement and Xcode/SDK version requirements
Expand to include expected outcomes, examples of good vs bad listings, and validation criteria
Expand to include detailed version increment strategy, handling breaking changes, and staged rollout configuration

suggestedNewContent.title: Privacy Manifest Requirements (iOS)
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy file creation, required reason APIs, data collection declarations, and App Store submission requirements since May 2024

suggestedNewContent.title: Updated Google Play Testing Requirements (2024)
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover new requirements for personal accounts: 20 testers for 14 continuous days, Play Console mobile app device verification, and closed testing track setup

suggestedNewContent.title: TestFlight Beta Distribution
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover TestFlight setup, internal vs external testing groups, build expiration, gathering feedback, and transitioning to App Store release

suggestedNewContent.title: Common Submission Rejection Reasons
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover top rejection reasons for both platforms, how to avoid them, and template responses for appeals/resubmission

suggestedNewContent.title: Android 15 and iOS 18 Compliance (2025)
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover API level 35 deadline (August 2025), 16KB page size requirement (November 2025), Xcode 16/iOS 18 SDK requirement (April 2025), and how to update apps for compliance

suggestedNewContent.title: Complete App Submission Walkthrough
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Step-by-step video-style walkthrough of submitting to both Google Play and App Store with screenshots and expected outcomes
